channel.title: Jkreativ Import
channel.description: Just another Jkreativ By Jegtheme site

item.title: Sample Page
item.dc:creator: jegtheme
item.content:encoded:
This is an example page. It's different from a blog post because it will stay in one place and will show up in your site navigation (in most themes). Most people start with an About page that introduces them to potential site visitors. It might say something like this:
Hi there! I'm a bike messenger by day, aspiring actor by night, and this is my blog. I live in Los Angeles, have a great dog named Jack, and I like piña coladas. (And gettin' caught in the rain.)
...or something like this:
The XYZ Doohickey Company was founded in 1971, and has been providing quality doohickeys to the public ever since. Located in Gotham City, XYZ employs over 2,000 people and does all kinds of awesome things for the Gotham community.
As a new WordPress user, you should go to your dashboard to delete this page and create new pages for your content. Have fun!

Warmest welcome for our guest

[/vc_column_text][jeg_hr hr_type="shorthr"][vc_column_text][dropcap]M[/dropcap]y Villas in Bali was developed with one person in mind ... YOU ! We offer luxury 1 & 2 Bedroom Villas located in the center of Ubud. It is your own private oasis whilst still being right in the heart of all that Ubud has to offer experience. What more could you ask for? Transition seamlessly from complete serenity, to world class restaurants, exciting nightlife and boutique shopping right on your doorstep. My Villas in Bali will arouse your senses and induce complete relaxation to refuel your body and soul, come and experience all we have to offer.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row section_id="heal-your-soul" section_name="Background Video" section_top_margin="forthtopmargin" section_bottom_margin="forthbottommargin" section_schema="light" section_background="video" background_repeat="repeat" moving_direction="horizontal" video_fallback_background="114" video_mp4="http://jegtheme.com/asset/jkreativ/video/newbali.mp4" video_webm="http://jegtheme.com/asset/jkreativ/video/newbali.webm" video_overlay="rgba(0,0,0,0.3)" video_parallax="yes" video_height="720" video_width="1280" parallax_speed_1="300" parallax_speed_2="300" parallax_speed_3="300" parallax_speed_4="300" parallax_speed_5="300" parallax_speed_6="300" parallax_speed_7="300" parallax_speed_8="300" parallax_speed_9="300" parallax_speed_10="300"][vc_column width="1/1"][jeg_landing_quote author="Jegtheme" text="Heal your soul & experience natural beauty of Bali and exotique traditional culture"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row section_id="facility" section_name="Our Signature Facility" section_top_margin="doubletopmargin" section_bottom_margin="doublebottommargin" section_schema="normal" section_background="color" background_color="#f8f8f8" background_repeat="repeat" moving_direction="horizontal" parallax_speed_1="300" parallax_speed_2="300" parallax_speed_3="300" parallax_speed_4="300" parallax_speed_5="300" parallax_speed_6="300" parallax_speed_7="300" parallax_speed_8="300" parallax_speed_9="300" parallax_speed_10="300"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text]

parallax background and currently the first who implement multi-layer parallax on Themeforest."][jeg_service_icon_item icon="fa-magic" title="Smoothest Parallax on Themeforest" desc="We push boundary and redefine parallax with using hardware-accelerated animation. You can compare how smooth our parallax with traditional lagging background-moving parallax."][jeg_service_icon_item icon="fa-cogs" title="Complete Parallax Control on Your Hand" desc="Never on any themes before that able to control direction and speed of parallax animation. We provide both of those capabilities on Jkreativ. Only your imagination is your limit."][/jeg_service_icon_wrapper][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row section_id="portfolio" section_name="Portfolio Features" section_top_margin="doubletopmargin" section_bottom_margin="doublebottommargin" section_schema="normal" section_background="color" background_color="#ffffff" background_repeat="repeat" moving_direction="horizontal" parallax_speed_1="300" parallax_speed_2="300" parallax_speed_3="300" parallax_speed_4="300" parallax_speed_5="300" parallax_speed_6="300" parallax_speed_7="300" parallax_speed_8="300" parallax_speed_9="300" parallax_speed_10="300"][vc_column width="1/1"][jeg_heading type="h1" float="center" title="The Most Complete Portfolio Option"][vc_row_inner enable_animation="yes" animspeed="fast" seqspeed="150"][vc_column_inner width="1/2" el_class="text-right-desktop" fadein="yes" position="left"][vc_column_text]

Mixed Multimedia Content

Tired with only single type content? with Jkreativ you have ability to mix your content such as youtube, vimeo, sound cloud also self hosted HTML 5 video.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2" fadein="yes" scale="yes" position="right"][vc_column_text] [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][jeg_spacing size="50"][vc_row_inner enable_animation="yes" animspeed="fast" seqspeed="150"][vc_column_inner width="1/2" fadein="yes" scale="yes" position="left"][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2" fadein="yes" position="right"][vc_column_text]

Control Your Portfolio Size, Dimension, and Size of Your Margin

Personalise your portfolio to fit everthing your need. you can create portrait portfolio with margin to show portrait image of model, or setup landscape portfolio. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][jeg_spacing size="50"][vc_row_inner enable_animation="yes" animspeed="fast" seqspeed="150"][vc_column_inner width="1/2" el_class="text-right-desktop" fadein="yes" position="left"][vc_column_text]

Portfolio Item Block Size

Sometime you will need to highlight some of your portfolio to make it more visible, no worry! We provide you option to control size (width & height) of every single portfolio item. You can make one of item bigger than any other item, or you can play around and create metro style portfolio. You in control on your portfolio.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2" fadein="yes" scale="yes" position="right"][vc_column_text]   [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner enable_animation="yes" animspeed="fast" seqspeed="150"][vc_column_inner width="1/2" el_class="text-right-desktop" fadein="yes" scale="yes" position="left"][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2" fadein="yes" position="right"][vc_column_text]

Ajax Expand, Extended Portfolio, or Side Content

You can choose fancy ajax load with effect that will WOW your visitor, or you can use extended portfolio that explain your project with detail, or if you photographer, with a lot of image to show and expected comment, you can use Side content portfolio. Everything you can choose with this themes. [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][jeg_spacing size="50"][vc_row_inner enable_animation="yes" animspeed="fast" seqspeed="150"][vc_column_inner width="1/2" el_class="text-right-desktop" fadein="yes" position="left"][vc_column_text]

Password-Protected Portfolio

Incase you need to hide your portfolio and only show it for particular client, you get covered with this themes. We build very easy to use password protected portfolio so when your visitor come to your page, they will need to enter password to see the complete content.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2" fadein="yes" scale="yes" position="right"][vc_column_text]   [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row]

item.title: Jkreativ - Landing Page III
item.dc:creator: jegtheme
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row section_id="landing-page" section_name="Powerful Landing Page" section_top_margin="doubletopmargin" section_bottom_margin="doublebottommargin" section_schema="light" section_background="imagebg" background_overlay="rgba(0,0,0,0.3)" image_background="96" background_vertical_position="center" background_horizontal_position="center" background_repeat="repeat" background_fullscreen="yes" moving_direction="horizontal" parallax_speed_1="300" parallax_speed_2="300" parallax_speed_3="300" parallax_speed_4="300" parallax_speed_5="300" parallax_speed_6="300" parallax_speed_7="300" parallax_speed_8="300" parallax_speed_9="300" parallax_speed_10="300"][vc_column width="1/1"][jeg_heading type="h1" float="center" title="Powerful Landing Page" alt="Create unique & awesome page is never been easier with section builder."][jeg_spacing size="20"][vc_row_inner enable_animation="yes" animspeed="fast" seqspeed="150"][vc_column_inner width="5/12" el_class="text-right-desktop" fadein="yes" position="left"][jeg_spacing size="10"][vc_column_text]

Powered by 3 Built-in Slider with Fullscreen Option & Revolution Slider

We include 3 build in slider such as split slider, fulltext slider, parallax slider and you have option to use fullscreen or normal height slider. on Text slider you also able to use video background with parallax or static attachment.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/12"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2" fadein="yes" scale="yes" position="right"][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner enable_animation="yes" animspeed="fast" seqspeed="150"][vc_column_inner width="1/2" fadein="yes" scale="yes" position="left"][vc_column_text] [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/12"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="5/12" el_class="text-right-desktop" fadein="yes" position="right"][jeg_spacing size="25"][vc_column_text]

Revolutionary Section Navigation

Once you create a long scroll landing page, your visitor may find it hard to navigate your website. We think about it and create landing navigation as solution. We create 2 landing navigation type that you can choose.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner enable_animation="yes" animspeed="fast" seqspeed="150"][vc_column_inner width="5/12" fadein="yes" position="left"][jeg_spacing size="25"][vc_column_text]

Background Options: Multi-Layer Parallax, Moving Image, Video Background & Solid Color

You are really in control for your background type, you have option for moving image background, or video background or just simply color background.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/12"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2" fadein="yes" scale="yes" position="right"][vc_column_text]   [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner enable_animation="yes" animspeed="fast" seqspeed="150"][vc_column_inner width="1/2" fadein="yes" scale="yes" position="left"][vc_column_text]     [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/12"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="5/12" fadein="yes" position="right"][jeg_spacing size="10"][vc_column_text]

Section Builder with Shortcode Generator to Easier Your Work

You having option to control 50 auto generated shortcode. with this themes. very easy and convenience to use to create great landing page.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row section_id="gallery" section_name="Amazing Gallery" section_top_margin="doubletopmargin" section_bottom_margin="doublebottommargin" section_schema="light" section_background="parallaxbg" background_repeat="repeat" moving_direction="horizontal" parallax_enable_1="yes" parallax_image_1="893" parallax_background_1="center" parallax_cover_1="yes" parallax_speed_1="300" parallax_enable_2="yes" parallax_image_2="894" parallax_background_2="center" parallax_speed_2="-500" parallax_enable_3="yes" parallax_image_3="895" parallax_background_3="center" parallax_speed_3="402" parallax_speed_4="300" parallax_speed_5="300" parallax_speed_6="300" parallax_speed_7="300" parallax_speed_8="300" parallax_speed_9="300" parallax_speed_10="300"][vc_column width="1/1"][vc_row_inner enable_animation="yes" animspeed="fast" seqspeed="150"][vc_column_inner width="7/12"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="5/12" fadein="yes" position="top"][jeg_heading type="h1" float="left" title="Amazing Gallery" alt="All-in-one galleries with tons of features"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner enable_animation="yes" animspeed="fast" seqspeed="150"][vc_column_inner width="7/12"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="5/12" fadein="yes" position="right"][vc_column_text]

Popular Justified Layout

We follow the trend of layout biggest tech company like google image, flickr, shutterstock, and you can have it too.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner enable_animation="yes" animspeed="fast" seqspeed="150"][vc_column_inner width="7/12"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="5/12" fadein="yes" position="right"][vc_column_text]

Inherit Portfolio Capability

We make gallery as powerful as portfolio. Gallery also inherit several portfolio capability.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner enable_animation="yes" animspeed="fast" seqspeed="150"][vc_column_inner width="7/12"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="5/12" fadein="yes" position="right"][vc_column_text]

Unlimited Gallery Content

With partial load technique, you can load as many as content without making your page very lag. you also can choose how many image to show at time.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row section_id="gallery-layout" section_top_margin="doubletopmargin" section_bottom_margin="doublebottommargin" section_schema="normal" section_background="color" background_color="#f8f8f8" background_repeat="repeat" moving_direction="horizontal" parallax_speed_1="300" parallax_speed_2="300" parallax_speed_3="300" parallax_speed_4="300" parallax_speed_5="300" parallax_speed_6="300" parallax_speed_7="300" parallax_speed_8="300" parallax_speed_9="300" parallax_speed_10="300"][vc_column width="1/1"][jeg_heading type="h1" float="center" title="Gallery Layout" alt="We give you the most complete & awesome galleries. With ton of feature, your gallery ready to amaze your website visitor."][vc_row_inner enable_animation="yes" animspeed="fast" seqspeed="150"][vc_column_inner width="1/3" fadein="yes" scale="yes" position="bottom"][vc_column_text]

Supported with 8 Post-Types

With our custom blog engine  you can choose 8 post-types when creating new post, wich is: Standar Post, Quote, Image Slider, HTML 5 Video, Youtube, Vimeo, Soundcloud, and Advertisement.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" fadein="yes" position="bottom"][vc_column_text]

4 Unique Blog List Layout

We give you 4 unique blog layout with complete options so you can customize easily each layout. You can filter post by tag/category, show/hide sidebar, change content width & position, and much more![/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" fadein="yes" position="bottom"][vc_column_text]

Different Post Different Style

Not only that, we give you another 4 styles of single blog layout, you can choose from Normal, wide, cover, and classic clean blog layout. So, each post can be look different with different layout & styling.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row section_id="blog-page-layout" section_name="Blog & Page Layout" section_top_margin="doubletopmargin" section_bottom_margin="doublebottommargin" section_schema="light" section_background="imagebg" background_overlay="rgba(0,0,0,0.3)" image_background="89" background_vertical_position="center" background_horizontal_position="center" background_repeat="repeat" moving_direction="horizontal" parallax_speed_1="300" parallax_speed_2="300" parallax_speed_3="300" parallax_speed_4="300" parallax_speed_5="300" parallax_speed_6="300" parallax_speed_7="300" parallax_speed_8="300" parallax_speed_9="300" parallax_speed_10="300"][vc_column width="1/1"][jeg_heading type="h1" float="center" title="Blog Layout" alt="Check this Blog demo out to show you what blog layout can do."][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3" fadein="yes" scale="yes" position="bottom"][vc_column_text]

 POWERFUL CONTACT PAGE

Contact page with ability to add multiple location & direction to simplify your user reach you.

[button type="primary" text="Contact with Maps" url="http://jkreativ.jegtheme.com/interior/contact/" open_new_tab="true" class="mb-20"]   [button type="success" text="Contact with Inquiry" url="http://jkreativ.jegtheme.com/wedding/inquiry/" open_new_tab="true" class="mb-20"]

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row section_id="special-features" section_name="Special Features" section_top_margin="normaltopmargin" section_bottom_margin="normalbottommargin" section_schema="normal" section_background="color" background_color="#ffffff" background_repeat="repeat" moving_direction="horizontal" parallax_speed_1="300" parallax_speed_2="300" parallax_speed_3="300" parallax_speed_4="300" parallax_speed_5="300" parallax_speed_6="300" parallax_speed_7="300" parallax_speed_8="300" parallax_speed_9="300" parallax_speed_10="300"][vc_column width="1/1"][jeg_heading type="h1" float="center" title="Special Features" alt="Another kick-ass features that you won't to miss."][vc_row_inner enable_animation="yes" animspeed="fast" seqspeed="302"][vc_column_inner width="5/12" position="bottom" fadein="yes"][vc_column_text]

360° Image Slider

Attract your customer with our 360° image feature that you can use for your product showcase or another purpose. Unlike another 360° Image Slider, this slider is reponsive, and animate very smooth.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/12"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2" fadein="yes" position="bottom"][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][jeg_hr hr_type="singlehr"][vc_row_inner enable_animation="yes" animspeed="fast" seqspeed="302"][vc_column_inner width="1/2" fadein="yes" position="bottom"][vc_column_text] [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/12"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="5/12" position="bottom" fadein="yes"][vc_column_text]

Protect your content with Unique Style

Protect your content or image from someone who want to stole your content. Try to right click on your content, it will show movie like credit. Instead to shoo them, we trying to amaze them with unique way.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][jeg_hr hr_type="singlehr"][vc_row_inner enable_animation="yes" animspeed="fast" seqspeed="302"][vc_column_inner width="5/12" position="bottom" fadein="yes"][vc_column_text]

Responsive & Retina Ready

Your website will show crisp on almost every modern device. From PC with Windows, Mac with Retina display, Tablet like iPad, android Phone, also iPhone. You don't need to create another mobile version of your website.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/12"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2" fadein="yes" position="bottom"][vc_column_text] [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][jeg_hr hr_type="singlehr"][vc_row_inner enable_animation="yes" animspeed="fast" seqspeed="302"][vc_column_inner width="1/2" fadein="yes" position="none"][jeg_image_sequence_wrapper animspeed="slow" seqspeed="284"][jeg_image_sequence_item fadein="yes" position="left" image="663"][jeg_image_sequence_item fadein="yes" position="left" image="666"][jeg_image_sequence_item fadein="yes" position="left" image="664"][/jeg_image_sequence_wrapper][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/12"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="5/12" position="bottom" fadein="yes"][vc_column_text]

Image & Content Animation

Animate anything from your block content, or image to attract your visitor attention. You also able to setup animation speed, sequence speed, use fade animation or scale, and direction of animation.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][jeg_hr hr_type="singlehr"][vc_row_inner enable_animation="yes" animspeed="fast" seqspeed="302"][vc_column_inner width="5/12" position="bottom" fadein="yes"][vc_column_text]

3 Types Page Loader

On very long page with media rich content, you will need indicator that your website is currently loading. You have option to choose 3 type of page loader. You can set page loader as global. Or you can also alter for single page.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/12"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2" fadein="yes" position="bottom"][vc_column_text]   [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][jeg_hr hr_type="singlehr"][vc_row_inner enable_animation="yes" animspeed="fast" seqspeed="302"][vc_column_inner width="1/2" fadein="yes" position="bottom"][vc_column_text]   [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/12"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="5/12" position="bottom" fadein="yes"][vc_column_text]

Smooth Scroll

To maximize experience for multi - layer parallax we use smooth scroll as integral feature on themes. On modern browser like Chrome or Firefox, you will have the best experience you can get on Jkreativ.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][jeg_hr hr_type="singlehr"][vc_row_inner enable_animation="yes" animspeed="fast" seqspeed="302"][vc_column_inner width="5/12" position="bottom" fadein="yes"][vc_column_text]

Custom Background & Menu Each Page

You can use different menu position and background on every blog post, page, portfolio, or product that you create with Jkreativ. Or you can setup global background and menu from customizer.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/12"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2" fadein="yes" position="bottom"][vc_column_text]     [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][jeg_hr hr_type="singlehr"][vc_row_inner enable_animation="yes" animspeed="fast" seqspeed="302"][vc_column_inner width="1/2" fadein="yes" position="bottom"][vc_column_text]     [/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/12"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="5/12" position="bottom" fadein="yes"][vc_column_text]

Parallax Video Background

We not only provide parallax for image, we also give option video as parallax.
